coding_practice.title: Combination Sum
coding_practice.description:
Given an array of distinct integers candidates and a target integer target, return a list of all unique combinations of candidates where the chosen numbers sum to target. You may return the combinations in any order.

The same number may be chosen from candidates an unlimited number of times. Two combinations are unique if the frequency of at least one of the chosen numbers is different.

The test cases are generated such that the number of unique combinations that sum up to target is less than 150 combinations for the given input.

examples.explanation:
2 and 3 are candidates, and 2 + 2 + 3 = 7. Note that 2 can be used multiple times.
7 is a candidate, and 7 = 7.
These are the only two combinations.

coding_practice.constraints:
1 <= candidates.length <= 30
2 <= candidates[i] <= 40
All elements of candidates are distinct.
1 <= target <= 40
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 初始化：定義空結果列表 res。
2. 回溯函數 backtrack(start, path, total)：
   2.1 如果 total == target，將 path 的副本加入 res。
   2.2 如果 total > target，直接返回。
   2.3 遍歷 candidates[start:]：
       2.3.1 將當前元素加入 path。
       2.3.2 遞迴調用 backtrack(i, path, total + candidates[i])（可重複使用同一元素）。
       2.3.3 移除最後一個元素回溯。
3. 調用 backtrack(0, [], 0) 開始遞迴。
4. 返回結果 res。
5. 複雜度分析：
   5.1 時間複雜度：O(N^(T/M+1))，N = candidates 長度，T = target，M = min(candidates)
   5.2 空間複雜度：O(T/M)，遞迴棧深度。
